Methods

  • Edit
    Get(Type)
    Get(Type)

    Creates ActorTypeInformation from actorType.

    public static ActorTypeInformation Get(Type actorType)Public Shared Function Get(actorType As Type) As ActorTypeInformation

    Parameters

    • actorType
      Type
      Type

      Type of class implementing the actor to create ActorTypeInforamtion for.

    Returns

    • ActorTypeInformation
      ActorTypeInformation

      ActorTypeInformation created from actorType.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentException
      ArgumentException

      When BaseType for actorType is not of type Actor.

      When actorType does not implement an interface deriving from IActor and is not marked as abstract.

      When actorType implements more than one interface which derives from IActor but doesn't have ActorServiceAttribute.

  • Edit
    TryGet(Type, out ActorTypeInformation)
    TryGet(Type, ByRef ActorTypeInformation)

    Creates ActorTypeInformation from actorType.

    public static bool TryGet(Type actorType, out ActorTypeInformation actorTypeInformation)Public Shared Function TryGet(actorType As Type, ByRef actorTypeInformation As ActorTypeInformation) As Boolean

    Parameters

    • actorType
      Type
      Type

      Type of class implementing the actor to create ActorTypeInforamtion for.

    • actorTypeInformation
      ActorTypeInformation
      ActorTypeInformation

      When this method returns, contains ActorTypeInformation, if the creation of ActorTypeInformation from actorType succeeded, or null if the creation failed. The creation fails if the actorType parameter is null or it does not implement an actor.

    Returns

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      true if ActorTypeInformation was successfully created for actorType; otherwise, false.

    Remarks

    Creation of ActorTypeInformation from actorType will fail when

    1. BaseType for actorType is not of type Actor.

    2. actorType does not implement an interface deriving from IActor and is not marked as abstract.

    3. actorType implements more than one interface which derives from IActor but doesn't have ActorServiceAttribute.

Details

Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Runtime
